contentrichtext.text: {{for|the [[List of sushi and sashimi ingredients|sushi/sashimi ingredient]]|crab|imitation crab}} {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Kani |JapaneseName= 可児市 |MapImage= Kani in Gifu Prefecture.png |Region= [[Chūbu region|Chūbu]] ([[Tōkai region|Tōkai]]) |Prefecture= [[Gifu Prefecture|Gifu]] |District= |Area_km2=87.60 |PopDate= July 2011<ref name=GifuEstimate>{{cite web|title=岐阜県の人口・世帯数人口動態統計調査結果|url=http://www.pref.gifu.lg.jp/kensei-unei/tokeijoho/kohyoshiryo/jinko-jutaku/jinko/2011/jinko201108.data/H2308kohyo.xls|work=Gifu prefectural website|publisher=Gifu Prefecture|accessdate=September 11, 2011|language=Japanese}}</ref> |Population= 97,435 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 35 |LatitudeMinutes= 26 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 137 |LongtitudeMinutes= 4 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree=[[Japanese Black Pine]] |Flower=[[Satsuki azalea]] and [[rose]] |Bird= |SymbolImage= Flag of Kani, Gifu.svg |SymbolDescription= Flag |Mayor= Shigeki Tomida<ref name=shichou>{{cite web|title=市長の部屋から|url=http://www.city.kani.gifu.jp/view.rbz?cd=2647|work=Kani official website|accessdate=August 11, 2011|language=Japanese}}</ref> |CityHallPostalCode= 509-0292 |CityHallAddress= Hiromi 1-1, Kani-shi, Gifu-ken |CityHallPhone= 0574-62-1111 |CityHallLink= [http://www.city.kani.gifu.jp/ City of Kani] }} {{nihongo|'''Kani'''|可児市|Kani-shi}} is a [[cities of Japan|city]] located in [[Gifu Prefecture|Gifu]], [[Japan]]. As of July 2011, the city has an estimated [[population]] of 97,435. The total area is 87.60 km². The city was founded on April 1, 1982 when the {{nihongo|town of Kani|可児町|Kani-chō}} gained city status. The town of Kani was formed in 1955 by a merger of 7 towns and villages in the western part of [[Kani District, Gifu|Kani district]]. On May 1, 2005 the town of [[Kaneyama, Gifu|Kaneyama]] merged into the city.<ref name=kaniHistory>{{cite web|title=可児市の概要|url=http://www.city.kani.gifu.jp/view.rbz?nd=143&ik=3&pnp=142&pnp=143&cd=83|work=Kani official website|accessdate=August 11, 2011|language=Japanese}}</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.city.kani.gifu.jp/ Official site] {{ja icon}} {{Gifu}} [[Category:Cities in Gifu Prefecture]] {{Gifu-geo-stub}}
